column4: /boot is using 98.9% of 91MB  How do I increase the size of the partition and/or identify files that can be deleted?
(No idea why such a small partition was created for /boot; I assume I used the defaults during setup.)
look for kernel version older than what "uname" reports, and remove them. that will free space in /boot
Any/all files with older version? abi- config- initrd.img- System.map- vmcoreinfo- and vmlinuz-?
